SELECT r.statday statDay ,rcdtype rcdType ,app_name as appName,abLine,r.appid, sum(r.callcnt) callCnt ,sum(r.succcnt) succCnt,CONCAT(CAST((sum(r.succcnt)/sum(r.callcnt))*100 AS DECIMAL(5,2)),'%')as callRate,lyscsum, sum(r.thscsum) thscSum,sum(r.jfscsum) jfscSum,sum(r.fee) fee,sum(r.recordingfee) recordingFee,case when succcnt=0 then '0' else ROUND(thscsum/succcnt,0) end as pjthsc FROM stat_sp_day_record r,tb_app_info ai WHERE r.appid = ai.appid
and rcdtype = #{params.rcdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and r.appid = #{params.appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and r.sid = #{params.sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DATE_FORMAT(r.statday,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT( #{ym,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m')
AND DATE_FORMAT(r.statday,'%Y-%m-%d') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(r.statday,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT( #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY abLine ,r.appid ,DATE_FORMAT(r.statday,'%Y-%m')
GROUP BY abLine, r.appid ,DATE_FORMAT(r.statday,'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY abLine ,r.appid ,DATE_FORMAT(r.statday,'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY r.statday DESC

SELECT tmp.statDay,tmp.appid,ifnull(tmp.fee,0)as fee,ifnull(tmp.recordingFee,0)as recordingFee,app.app_name as appName
FROM (SELECT a.statday statDay,a.appid,sum(a.fee) AS fee,sum(a.recordingfee) AS recordingFee FROM stat_sp_day_record a WHERE 1=1
and feeid = #{params.feeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.appid = #{params.appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.statday,'%Y-%m-%d') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.statday,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT( #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY a.appid, a.statday ) AS tmp LEFT JOIN tb_app_info app ON tmp.appid = app.appid order by statday DESC
